## Experiment Summary

```{python}
#| code-fold: true
import datetime
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from vns import Experiment


sessions = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "session": [1, 2],
        "session_date": [datetime.date(2020, 1, 1)] * 2,
    }
)

trials = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "trial": [1] * 2,
        "trial_time": [datetime.time(10, 0)] * 2,
        "proportion_looking": [.5] * 2,
    },
    index=pd.Index([1,2], name="session")
)

experiment = sessions.join(trials)

px.scatter(
    experiment,
    x="trial",
    y="proportion_looking",
    facet_col="session",
    template="plotly_white",
)
```
